title: Hide Creator Message in Rooms Without Media

requirements.summary: Conditionally display Creator message in room cards only when media is present
acceptanceCriteria: Rooms created with images display the Creator message
Rooms created with videos display the Creator message
Rooms created with X posts display the Creator message
Rooms created without any media do not display the Creator message

file_operations.description: Update the ChatroomCard component to conditionally render the Creator message section based on the presence of mediaUrl and mediaType. Add a check that evaluates whether the room has associated media (image, video, or X post) before rendering the Creator message element. The mediaUrl and mediaType fields from LobbyChatroomCard are already available in the component props and can be used to determine if media exists. Keep all existing thumbnail preview logic, live status indicators, participant counts, and timestamp formatting unchanged.
